alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Madison; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:47PM EDT until September 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Otsego County in central New York... Southwestern Madison County in central New York... Northwestern Delaware County in central New York... Northeastern Cortland County in central New York... Chenango County in central New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 545 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Solon to near Plymouth to 7 miles northeast of Deposit, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Norwich, Eaton, Hamilton, Sidney, Guilford, Nelson, Plymouth, North Norwich, and Oxford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
